name: Love waifu #156 - Barnyard Tease
description: Kneeling in the hay, her cow-print bikini struggles to contain her generous curves. The way she bites her lip, the nervous tremble in her thighs, the way her hands press together—she’s embarrassed, but not enough to stop. The heat in the barn is nothing compared to the fire in her red eyes. Will you be the one to make her moo?

attributes.value: The "Love Waifu" collection is a series of unique digital artworks featuring anime-style female characters in diverse emotional states and situations. Each NFT heroine isn't just a character — she's a moment suspended between temptation, vulnerability, and playful power. Enter a world where a single look can say more than any line of dialogue.
